claim: in 1989 , hb - honda have the most win of any year with 2
resp:

2. Find the row in the table corresponding to the identified year, and note down the team name associated with it: hb - honda
3. Check the "wins" column for this team in all years to find out how many times they have won in any year: we see that their wins are 2 in 1989 (relevant cell: {"row_index": 10, "column_name": "wins"})
4. Compare the number of wins for hb - honda in 1989 with the wins of any other team in any year: there are no rows where the team and year combination match any other years in the table
5. Since hb - honda have exactly 2 wins in 1989 and there are no rows with a greater number of wins for any year, we can conclude that they indeed have the most wins in any year with 2 wins
